title: Sweet and Spicy Veggies
directions: Boil carrot in 2 cups of water for 2 minutes and then add broccoli and boil for another 30 seconds. Drain
Heat oil in a kadhai. Add red chillis and Garlic. Stir and add onions and after a minute, add all other vegetables (carrot, broccoli, red and green bell peppers, baby corn)
Sitr for 4-5 minutes, then add salt and pepper.
Pour 1 and half cup of water and bring to a boil.
Simmer the heat and add the dissolved corn flour and cook for 2-3 min till the sauce becomes thick.
ingredients: Half a carrot- Peeled and cut into thin slices
Half cup broccoli- cut into small florets
1 small onion- cut into ½ inch cubes
Red and Green Bell peppers- Half a cup
1 tsp Soya sauce, 1 and ½ tsp Green Chili sauce, 1 tsp tomato sauce
2-3 tsp corn flour mixed with half a cup of water
3 red chillies- broken into small pieces
6-8 flakes of garlic- finely chopped or crushed
